ygData.subject: RE: Star Rubies
ygData.msgSnippet: You can buy them in the shop that sells gems in Qeynos - blue door adjacent to Ironforges - (back room of Ironforges) North side of city on the way to the zone
ygData.messageBody:
You can buy them in the shop that sells gems in Qeynos - blue door adjacent
to Ironforges - (back room of Ironforges) North side of city on the way to
the zone that comes out by the clock. 70pp if you have really good charisma
(a gypsy in South Qey sells a Silk Evening Tunic that will add +5 or more
cha - 4pp) You want STAR rubies not regular ruby. The 2nd woman in the
shop sells the star rubies.

Snyak
Warrior of the 13th Level
Qeynos, Antonica 53226 visiting Freeport
Innoruuk
"The opinions expressed herein are my own and do not
necessarily reflect those of my Guild Master nor my Deity."


-----Original Message-----
From: Obergfell, Steven [mailto:SObergfell@...]
Sent: Thursday, December 02, 1999 12:53 PM
To: 'warriors_eq@onelist.com'
Subject: [warriors_eq] Star Rubies

From: "Obergfell, Steven" <SObergfell@...>

OK,

Doing the crafted quest for some gauntlets. Where is a good
place for a
Barbarian Warrior to buy the Star Rubies? I am currently in
High Hold Pass,
and would like to try and avoid the Death trap that is
Kithicor Forest, so I
am hoping there is a place to buy them on this side of the
Continent. I
appreciate any help.


LefGrebo Halasson
Warrior of 20 Seasons
Mith Marr
